import React, {useState} from 'react' const ImageEditor = () => { const [bBoxes, setBBoxes] = useState([]) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({xPos: 0, yPos: 0, width: 0, height: 0}) const handeSumbit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setBBoxes([...this.state.bBoxes], ) } const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData(formData[e.target.id] = e.target.value) } return (
) } export default ImageEditor
